DOC.brief_summary: Objective study evaluate safety efficacy Lutonix 035 Drug Coated Dilatation PTA Catheter Bard LifeStent Vascular Stent ( hereinafter refer LifeStent ) treatment long ( 10-24 cm ) lesion SFA .
DOC.brief_title: Bard LifeStent Lutonix DCB Treatment Long Lesions Femoropopliteal Arteries
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age ≥18 year 2 . The subject legally competent able understand information study , informed nature , scope relevance study , voluntarily agree participation study 's provision , duly sign Informed Consent Form ( ICF ) 3 . Rutherford Category 24 4 . Target de novo lesion ( ) nonstented restenotic lesion ( ) angiographic evidence ≥50 % stenosis occlusion ( visual estimate ) amenable treatment LifeStent Lutonix DCB 5 . Patients must able treated Lutonix DCB LifeStent 6 . Total treated segment ( ) 1024 cm length 7 . Target vessel reference diameter 4.07.0 mm ( visual estimate ) able treat available device size matrix 8 . At least one patent native outflow artery ankle free significant lesion ( ≥50 % stenosis ) confirm angiography ( treatment outflow disease NOT permit ; treatment inflow disease permit prior treatment LifeStent ) 1 . Life expectancy < 1 year 2 . Inability take require antiplatelet/anticoagulant medication per LifeStent Lutonix DCB IFU , know contraindication ( include allergic reaction ) sensitivity contrast medium , nickel , titanium tantalum adequately manage pre postprocedure medication 3 . Intended treatment outflow disease index procedure 4 . Intended use laser , atherectomy cryoplasty index procedure 5 . Sudden symptom onset , acute vessel occlusion , acute subacute thrombus target vessel 6 . History stroke within 3 month 7 . History myocardial infarction , thrombolysis angina within 2 week enrollment
